cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website, which helps us improve our services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At Hambax, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our website and services. By using our services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, information we collect automatically when you use our services, and information from third parties.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.content: We may collect the following types of personal data:

items.name: Name and contact details (such as email address, phone number)
items.email: Email address for account creation and communication
items.phone: Phone number for verification and communication
items.address: Address information for event locations and billing
items.payment: Payment information (processed securely through our payment processors)

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities on our website. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website, which helps us improve our services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner or by adjusting your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

purposes.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about our services, respond to your inquiries, and send you updates
purposes.improvement: To analyze and improve our services and develop new products and features
purposes.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

dataSharing.title: How We Share Your Information
dataSharing.content: We may share your information with the following categories of recipients:

recipients.serviceProviders: Service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, and customer service
recipients.legal: Law enforcement agencies, courts, or other government authorities when required by law
recipients.business: In connection with a business transaction, such as a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. To determine the appropriate retention period, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the personal data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure, and the purposes for which we process the data.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You have the right to request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete personal data we hold about you.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: You have the right to request that we delete your personal data in certain circumstances.

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You have the right to request that we transfer your personal data to another service provider in certain circumstances.

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances.

consent.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
consent.description: You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time where we rely on consent to process your personal data.

userRights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to read their privacy policies before providing any personal data to them. We use the following third-party services:

analytics.title: Google Analytics
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to analyze the use of our website. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information about your use of our website. You can learn more about Google Analytics' privacy practices at https://policies.google.com/privacy.

payment.title: Payment Processors
payment.description: We use third-party payment processors to process payments made through our website. These payment processors may collect and store your payment information in accordance with their privacy policies.

social.title: Social Media
social.description: Our website may include social media features, such as the Facebook Like button. These features may collect your IP address and which page you are visiting on our website, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under the age of 16, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under 16, we will take steps to delete such information.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you by posting a notice on our website or by sending you an email. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

dataAccessRequest.title: Data Access Request
dataAccessRequest.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Please fill out the form below to submit a request.

form.name: Full Name
form.success: Your request has been submitted. We will process it within 30 days and contact you at the email address provided.
form.error: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again later.
